incidents.name: [GRA2][Network] - Rooms G263/G266/G267
incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting rooms G263, G266 and G267 has been resolved. Start time : 23/09/2025 20:18 UTC End time : 23/09/2025 20:21 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the specified rooms were temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Some customers were temporarily unable to access and use their servers located in rooms G263, G266 and G267. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [RBX/BHS][Network] - vRack Private Network incident notification
incidents.message: We experienced an incident that affected our vRack Private Network offer and it has now been resolved. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 07/07/2025 11:52 UTC End time : 07/07/2025 16:30 UTC Impacted Service(s) : vRack private network was temporarily unavailable for some servers in BHS and RBX. Customers Impact : Some customers were temporarily unable to access and use their servers through vRack. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
